definition: to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: Your track is diverging from reference line.
sentences.chinese: 你船的航迹和参照线不平行。

sentences.english: How to overcome the SRC (Self-Reference Criterion)?
sentences.chinese: 如何克服自我参照标准？

sentences.english: Putonghua test is a kind of standard referential test.
sentences.chinese: 普通话水平测试属于标准参照性考试。

sentences.english: It is successfully integrated into the Park, making various references to the surrounding city.
sentences.chinese: 它成功地融入公园，与周边城市形成各种参照。

sentences.english: Your position distance 400metres from intersection of reference line.
sentences.chinese: 你船的位置距参照线交点400米。

sentences.english: Make a personal information card according to 2.
sentences.chinese: 让学生参照2，各自做一张个人信息卡。

sentences.english: Refer to the Performance Evaluation Sheet.
sentences.chinese: 参照公司另行制定的绩效考核表。

sentences.english: Select a dimension to get info and highlight its references.
sentences.chinese: 选择一尺寸以获取信息并加亮其参照。

sentences.english: Reference to the actual costs, NG scheduled consultations.
sentences.chinese: 费用参照实际情况，协商仪定。

sentences.english: When taking photographs of treasured possessions, include references in the photographs.
sentences.chinese: 在为珍贵物品拍照时，画面里须含有参照物。

sentences.english: We lose the references and in doing so have lost ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我们失去了参照，这么做我们就迷失了自己。

sentences.english: All cocktails are individual priced and subject to 15% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 详细价格请参照酒水牌，另需加15%服务费。

sentences.english: We determined an outcome-drien reference frame for ABP measurement.
sentences.chinese: 我们确定一个结果为向导的参照系测量动态血压。

sentences.english: The anti-forgery properties of the passports shall be based on international technical standards.
sentences.chinese: 护照的防伪性能参照国际技术标准制定。

sentences.english: We should differ it from the same language region because there are so many forms of reference objects to words.
sentences.chinese: 参照体是多种多样的，应当把它同论域等区别开来。

sentences.english: Refer to Architect's General Specification for concrete strength and mortar mix.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土强度及灰浆混合比例须参照建筑师之基本规范。

definition: according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
see also/please refer to/compare (cf.)/to consult for reference
in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
